str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A deluge, flood. From katakluzo; an inundation.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To eat, partake of a meal.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To give in marriage. From gamos; to espouse.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
(Hebrew) Noah. Of Hebrew origin; Noe, a patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A box, i.e. The sacred ark and that of Noah.
